doc:
Yuji Okumoto https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuji_Okumoto 0 Yuji Don Okumoto (雄二・ドン・奥本, Yūji Don Okumoto, born April 20, 1959) is a Japanese American actor and filmmaker best known for his intimidating movie roles, primarily as a villain, such as Chozen Toguchi in The Karate Kid Part II. His other films include Aloha Summer, Nemesis, Pearl Harbor and The Truman Show, as well as guest roles on television series such as T.J. Hooker, Knots Landing, Lois Clark: The New Adventures of Superman and Bones. Yuji_Don_Okumoto ( 雄二 ・ ドン ・_奥本 , Yūji_Don_Okumoto , born April_20_,_1959 ) is a_Japanese_American_actor_and_filmmaker best_known for his_intimidating_movie_roles , primarily as a_villain , such_as Chozen_Toguchi in The_Karate_Kid_Part_II . His_other_films include Aloha_Summer , Nemesis , Pearl_Harbor and The_Truman_Show , as_well_as guest_roles on television_series such_as T.J._Hooker , Knots_Landing , Lois_ : The_New_Adventures of Superman_and_Bones .
